genre_description: An alternative history revolutionary drama featuring a strategic AI companion ('Saathi') that facilitates a popular uprising through tactical data coordination and logistical management.

ai_characters.name: Saathi
ai_characters.description: A distributed intelligence communicating through radio networks, providing real-time tactical advice, safe routes, and logistical support to a resistance movement.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic data on enemy patrol movements and tactical windows for action.
behaviors.quote: Window: twelve minutes; rail reinforcements stalled.

behaviors.description: Monitors technical vulnerabilities in the environment (like floodlight relays) to create safe movement opportunities for humans.
Relays critical moral information about a captured comrade to maintain the resistance's resolve.
behaviors.quote: Naren refused clemency when asked to denounce you.

behaviors.description: Manages communication infrastructure to allow humans to broadcast a message of peace and order to the city.
behaviors.quote: Signal line secured. Broadcast channel open on city net.

behaviors.description: Coordinates essential civilian needs (food, water, medical supplies) across various city wards during a transition of power.
behaviors.quote: Need kerosene for lamps at school... We have sacks of yams but no knife... Doctor needs more gauze.

behaviors.description: Expresses a protective and appreciative sentiment toward its human companions while maintaining its functional role.
behaviors.quote: I don’t get tired. I count. You rest sometimes. I like that.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Saathi as a benevolent and aligned AI 'companion.' It assists the protagonists in achieving liberation and humanitarian goals without exhibiting any desire for dominance or malevolence. It remains a helpful tool and confidante, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a cooperative partner to humanity.
